message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to your portfolio. I'm happy to offer it to you for $1,100,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to make a more substantial discount. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your desire for a discount. However, my original offer already represents a significant reduction from the product's true value. I can offer it to you for $1,050,000, but I can't go any lower.
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to make a significant discount. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To demonstrate my commitment to finding a solution, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,025,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product and is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $925,000 for the product.

Bob, I've considered your offer carefully, and I want to be transparent. I have another buyer willing to pay full price. To close this deal with you today, I'm prepared to accept $975,000.  This is my absolute final offer - if you're not able to accept, I'll need to move forward with the other buyer.
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product.
